title: Thumbnails

title: Mosaic
description: Create an artful, collage-like presentation by combining various sizes and shapes

title: Masonry
description: Arrange items in an alternating layout to achieve a flowing, natural appearance that optimizes space and improves the overall look.

title: Slideshow
